iconType.label: Choose the icon style used for the TX/RX indicators.

minWidth.label: Set a minimum width for the widget (in px).

byteThresholdActive.label: Show Active Threshold
byteThresholdActive.desc: Set the activity threshold in bytes per second (B/s).

showNumbers.label: Show Values
showNumbers.desc: Display the current RX/TX speeds as numbers.

forceMegabytes.label: Force megabytes (MB)
forceMegabytes.desc: Show all traffic values in MB instead of switching to KB for low usage.

spacingInbetween.label: Vertical Spacing
spacingInbetween.desc: Adjust the spacing between RX/TX elements.

fontSizeModifier.label: Font Size Modifier
fontSizeModifier.desc: Scale the text size relative to the default.

iconSizeModifier.label: Icon Size Modifier
iconSizeModifier.desc: Scale the icon size relative to the default.

useCustomColors.label: Custom Colors
useCustomColors.desc: Enable custom colors instead of theme defaults.

colorTx.label: TX Active
colorTx.desc: Set the upload (TX) icon color when above the threshold.

colorRx.label: RX Active
colorRx.desc: Set the download (RX) icon color when above the threshold.

colorSilent.label: RX/TX Inactive
colorSilent.desc: Set the icon color when traffic is below the threshold.

colorText.label: Text
colorText.desc: Set the text color used for both RX and TX values.
